author: Crossedfall (Crossedfall#1001)
install_msg:
Thank you for installing getnotes! Please note that the `setnotesdatabase` commands are owner only
see the [readme](https://github.com/crossedfall/crossed-cogs#getnotes) for detailed setup instructions.
name: SS13 Notes Helper
short: Obtains player notes and posts them into discord on command!
description: Pulls player notes from your database. TG Scheme required
